created_by: Dave Kennedy, Jeff Warren (method) / David Vassallo (rule)
name: Pass the Hash Activity 2
description: Detects the attack technique pass the hash which is used to move laterally inside the network
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND ((event.code:4624 AND user.id:/[Ss]\-1\-0\-0/ AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:3 AND winlog.event_data.LogonProcessName:/[Nn][Tt][Ll][Mm][Ss][Ss][Pp]/ AND winlog.event_data.KeyLength:0) OR (event.code:4624 AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:9 AND winlog.event_data.LogonProcessName:/[Ss][Ee][Cc][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo]/)) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:/[Aa][Nn][Oo][Nn][Yy][Mm][Oo][Uu][Ss]\ [Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND ((event.code:4624 AND user.id:S\-1\-0\-0 AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:3 AND winlog.event_data.LogonProcessName:NtLmSsp AND winlog.event_data.KeyLength:0) OR (event.code:4624 AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:9 AND winlog.event_data.LogonProcessName:seclogo)) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:ANONYMOUS\ LOGON)))`
